issue.description: 2610044O15Rik (GeneID: 72139, NM_153780.1) is missing from the assembly; it's assignment to chr.17 may be questionable
issue.resolution_text: AC239880.3 (RP24-122D14), picked on the end of chrom. 8, fully represents NM_153780.1

issue.status_text: This RefSeq represents sequence from strain "129".
issue.description: Defcr6 (NM_007852.1) is missing from the current assembly (Build 37).

issue.status_text: This RefSeq represents sequence from strain C3H/HeN.
issue.description: NM_001005418.1 is not represented in the current reference assembly.

issue.summary: Defb33 and other defensin (pseudo)genes missing after assembly change removed AC140205.2.
issue.description: Defb33 and other defensin (pseudo)genes missing after assembly change removed AC140205.2.
issue.resolution_text: AC140205.2 has been reintroduced into the TPF.

issue.status_text: PCR will be performed on C57BL/6 genomic DNA at the location of the discrepancy.
issue.description: Single nt in/del in the alignment of the RefSeq NM_023065.3 to genomic component AC162446.2.
Single nt in/del in the alignment of the RefSeq NM_029701.1 to genomic component AC107780.12.
issue.resolution_text: Switchpoints have been curated to use the sequence of AC102933.6, which agrees with the transcript, through this region of overlap.

issue.status_text: This RefSeq represents sequence from an outbred Swiss albino strain.
issue.description: GeneID: 13222 (Defcr-rs2) aligns to multiple sites with reduced % ID, suggesting this gene may not be represented in the current assembly (Build 37).

issue.status_text: This RefSeq represents sequence from strain "129"
issue.description: Defcr-rs7 (GeneID: 13226) is missing from reference chr. 8
NM_010031.2 aligns to many sites with a reduced % ID, suggesting that this gene may not be represented in the current reference assembly.
The alignments of the first exon of Es1 (Gene ID: 13884) may suggest a possible false duplication.
There is a type 2 reference assembly gap present between components AC148089.8 and AC152164.15
issue.resolution_text: AC168205.7 and AC241392.3, which overlap with each other but with neither of the gap flanking clones, were placed into the middle of this gap. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in MG-4156 and MG-4157.

issue.description: There is a reference assembly gap present between components AC152164.15 and AC140205.2
issue.resolution_text: AC240744.3 was sequenced and placed into the middle of this gap, and AC140205.2 was added to the right side of this gap for GRCm38. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in MG-4158 and MG-4159.

issue.description: There is a type 2 reference assembly gap present between components AC129174.3 and AC133094.4
issue.resolution_text: RP23-16O24 AC240396.3 and CH36-223O13 AC239604.3 have been selected, sequenced, and submitted, and they close this gap.

issue.status_text: No picks are currently available for this gap.
issue.description: There is a type 2 reference assembly gap present between components AC168310.6 and AC171318.3

issue.status_text: No picks are currently available for this gap.
issue.description: There is a reference assembly gap present between components AC168314.2 and AC174643.3
There is a reference assembly gap present between components AC164586.7 and AC148768.16
issue.resolution_text: AC242883.2 was sequenced and extends into this gap for GRCm38. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in MG-4165.

issue.description: There is a reference assembly gap present between components AC140351.2 and AC099723.16
issue.resolution_text: AC242529.3 has been sequenced and extends into this gap for GRCm38. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in MG-4153.

issue.status_text: No picks are currently available for this gap.
issue.description: There is a reference assembly gap present between components AC182435.3 and AC171917.14

issue.summary: Possible sequence problem in a tandem region with components potentially spanning chromosomes 8 and 5
issue.status_text: PCR will be performed on C57BL/6 genomic DNA in the region of the discrepancies.
issue.description: Potential tandem sequence missassembly in a single clone on Chromosome 8 (AC121952.4) flagged by ESTs during annotation of Cmtm1.

issue.status_text: PCR will be performed on C57BL/6 genomic DNA at the location of the discrepancy.
issue.description: Alignment of NM_001166399.1 suggests that there is an extra base in the reference which may cause a non-consensus splice site.

issue.summary: Should Mm37 unlocalized contig NT_166309 be retained in future assemblies?
issue.description: Determine evidence for retaining NT_166309 in future assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: AC140205.2 is now on the chromosome 8 TPF v.8 extending from AC161189.12

issue.summary: Should Mm37 unlocalized contig NT_166310 be retained in future assemblies?
issue.description: Determine evidence for retaining NT_166310 in future assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: AC168060.4 is redundant with reference components AC139158.3 - AL672234.27 - AL731650.26

issue.summary: Should Mm37 unlocalized contig NT_166311 be retained in future assemblies?
issue.description: Determine evidence for retaining NT_166311 in future assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: NT_166311 (component AC168205.7) has been placed on the chr. 8 TPF extending from AC241392.3

issue.summary: Possible single nucleotide error in reference component AC108436.5
issue.status_text: PCR will be performed on C57BL/6 genomic DNA at the location of the discrepancy.
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC108436.5

issue.summary: Possible single nucleotide error in reference component AC103360.9
issue.status_text: PCR will be performed on C57BL/6 genomic DNA at the location of the discrepancy.
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC103360.9

issue.status_text: PCR will be performed on C57BL/6 genomic DNA at the location of the discrepancy.
issue.description: Possible nt insertion in genomic sequence for Pkd1l2 or a non-canonical splice.
There is an IS10 element and one copy of the flanking target site duplication (GATGAAGCA) in WUGSC clone AC165441.3.
issue.resolution_text: This contamination has been excised and the clone resubmitted as AC165441.4

issue.description: Chr. 8 sequence does not extend into the telomere in Build 37.
issue.resolution_text: AC239880.3 and AC225376.3 have been sequenced and extend into the Chr. 8 telomeric repeat. AC183499.2 has been removed as redundant.

issue.description: There is a reference assembly gap present between components AC140351.2 and AC242529.3. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in MG-3616.
There is a type 2 reference assembly gap present between components AC148089.8 and AC168205.7. This is one of the tickets that will track the continued effort to close the gap reported in MG-3610.
There is a type 2 reference assembly gap present between components AC241392.3 and AC152164.15. This is one of the tickets that will track the continued effort to close the gap reported in MG-3610.
There is a reference assembly gap present between components AC152164.15 and AC240744.3. This is one of the tickets that will track the continued effort to close the gap reported in MG-3611.
There is a reference assembly gap present between components AC240744.3 and AC140205.2. This is one of the tickets that will track the continued effort to close the gap reported in MG-3611.

issue.status_text: The gap flanking components each terminate in unresolved tandem repeat. We are unable to sequence through this repeat with current technologies and have exhausted all other options. Efforts to close this gap are now stalled.
issue.description: There is a reference assembly gap present between components AC164586.7 and AC242883.2. This ticket is a continuation of MG-3615.
In progress

issue.status_text: This RefSeq represents sequence from an unidentified strain.
issue.description: GeneID: 13219 (Defcr-rs10) is missing from the current assembly (Build 37).
The alignment of RefSeq NM_001003951.1 (Ces7) to the reference suggests a rearrangement in component AC162945.5
issue.resolution_text: The two reference components, AC162945.5 and AC124591.4, were found to have an inversion between two repeat elements causing this alignment problem. They have now been fixed and resubmitted.

issue.status_text: This RefSeq represents sequence from strain "129".
issue.description: GeneID: 13221 (Defcr-rs12) is missing from the current assembly (Build 37).
There is an assembly gap between AC140351.2 and CAAA01063301.1
issue.resolution_text: Efforts to close this gap will be tracked in MG-4153.

issue.description: There is an assembly gap between AC168314.2 and CAAA01027656.1
issue.resolution_text: Efforts to close this gap will be tracked in linked ticket MG-3614.
